title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 830.5 - Assigned classifications and standards of quality and purity
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 830.5 - Assigned classifications and standards of quality and purity

State Regulations

The classifications and standards of quality and purity
which are hereby assigned to all fresh surface waters within the Lake Champlain
drainage basin within New York State are as set forth in table
I. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
830.5

Renumbered from 830.3

New

York State Register November 1, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 44, eff. 11/1/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
